comment._content: Commander in Chief of the Navy's Atlantic Fleet, Adm. Frank Friday Fletcher. This was probably taken aboard the Wyoming. See also: See also

comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frank_Friday_Fletcher Frank Friday Fletcher (November 23, 1855 – November 28, 1928) was an United States Navy admiral who served in the late 19th and early 20th centuries. He was awarded the U.S. military's highest decoration, the Medal of Honor, for his actions as commander of Navy forces at the Battle of Veracruz, Mexico.
